column4: I tried changing sources.list in tty1 after booting the ISO, then firing the install, but no luck. still the default repository mirror
It's kind of weird, the nl.archive.ubuntu.com allows about 100 kB/s, while nl3.arhive.ubuntu.com allows 6 MB/s, but stupid installer doesn't allow to change the mirror
don't anthropomorphise software ;] it has no intelligence
